verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> are the words <S%H1697><s%> of the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to make <S%H3772><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he made <S%H3772><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them in Horeb. <S%H2722><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Ye <S%H859><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> before your eyes <S%H5869><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> unto Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and unto all <S%H3605><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and unto all <S%H3605><s%> his land; <S%H776><s%>

The great <S%H1419><s%> temptations <S%H4531><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen, <S%H7200><s%> the signs, <S%H226><s%> and those <S%H1992><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> miracles: <S%H4159><s%>

Yet the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> you a heart <S%H3820><s%> to perceive, <S%H3045><s%> and eyes <S%H5869><s%> to see, <S%H7200><s%> and ears <S%H241><s%> to hear, <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And I have led <S%H1980><s%> you forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> your clothes <S%H8008><s%> are not <S%H3808><s%> waxen old <S%H1086><s%> upon <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> you, and thy shoe <S%H5275><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> waxen old <S%H1086><s%> upon <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thy foot. <S%H7272><s%>

Ye have not <S%H3808><s%> eaten <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> have ye drunk <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> or strong drink: <S%H7941><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> ye might know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

And when ye came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> us unto battle, <S%H4421><s%> and we smote <S%H5221><s%> them:

And we took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> their land, <S%H776><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> it for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> unto the Reubenites, <S%H7206><s%> and to the Gadites, <S%H1425><s%> and to the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4520><s%>

Keep <S%H8104><s%> therefore <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them, that <S%H4616><s%> ye may prosper <S%H7919><s%> <S%H853><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> ye do. <S%H6213><s%>

Ye <S%H859><s%> stand <S%H5324><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of you before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> your captains <S%H7218><s%> of your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> your elders, <S%H2205><s%> and your officers, <S%H7860><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

Your little ones, <S%H2945><s%> your wives, <S%H802><s%> and thy stranger <S%H1616><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in <S%H7130><s%> thy camp, <S%H4264><s%> from the hewer <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2404><s%> of thy wood <S%H6086><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the drawer <S%H7579><s%> of thy water: <S%H4325><s%>

That thou shouldest enter <S%H5674><s%> into covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and into his oath, <S%H423><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> maketh <S%H3772><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee this day: <S%H3117><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> he may establish <S%H6965><s%> thee today <S%H3117><s%> for a people <S%H5971><s%> unto himself, and that he <S%H1931><s%> may be <S%H1961><s%> unto thee a God, <S%H430><s%> as <S%H834><s%> he hath said <S%H1696><s%> unto thee, and as <S%H834><s%> he hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers, <S%H1><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
Neither <S%H3808><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you only <S%H905><s%> do I <S%H595><s%> make <S%H3772><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> and this <S%H2063><s%> oath; <S%H423><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him that <S%H834><s%> standeth <S%H5975><s%> here <S%H6311><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> us this day <S%H3117><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> and also with <S%H854><s%> him that <S%H834><s%> is not <S%H369><s%> here <S%H6311><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> us this day: <S%H3117><s%>

(For <S%H3588><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> how <S%H834><s%> we have dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> and how <S%H834><s%> we came <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H7130><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye passed by; <S%H5674><s%>

And ye have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> their abominations, <S%H8251><s%> and their idols, <S%H1544><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone, <S%H68><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were among <S%H5973><s%> them: )

Lest <S%H6435><s%> there should be <S%H3426><s%> among you man, <S%H376><s%> or <S%H176><s%> woman, <S%H802><s%> or <S%H176><s%> family, <S%H4940><s%> or <S%H176><s%> tribe, <S%H7626><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> turneth away <S%H6437><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of these <S%H1992><s%> nations; <S%H1471><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> there should be <S%H3426><s%> among you a root <S%H8328><s%> that beareth <S%H6509><s%> gall <S%H7219><s%> and wormwood; <S%H3939><s%>

And it come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when he heareth <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> curse, <S%H423><s%> that he bless himself <S%H1288><s%> in his heart, <S%H3824><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> I shall have <S%H1961><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> though <S%H3588><s%> I walk <S%H1980><s%> in the imagination <S%H8307><s%> of mine heart, <S%H3820><s%> to <S%H4616><s%> add <S%H5595><s%> drunkenness <S%H7302><s%> to <S%H854><s%> thirst: <S%H6771><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> spare <S%H5545><s%> him, but <S%H3588><s%> then <S%H227><s%> the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> and his jealousy <S%H7068><s%> shall smoke <S%H6225><s%> against that <S%H1931><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the curses <S%H423><s%> that are written <S%H3789><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> book <S%H5612><s%> shall lie <S%H7257><s%> upon him, and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall blot out <S%H4229><s%> <S%H853><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> from under <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> heaven. <S%H8064><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall separate <S%H914><s%> him unto evil <S%H7451><s%> out of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> the curses <S%H423><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> that are written <S%H3789><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> book <S%H5612><s%> of the law: <S%H8451><s%>

So that the generation <S%H1755><s%> to come <S%H314><s%> of your children <S%H1121><s%> that <S%H834><s%> shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> after <S%H4480><s%> <S%H310><s%> you, and the stranger <S%H5237><s%> that <S%H834><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> from a far <S%H7350><s%> land, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> when they see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the plagues <S%H4347><s%> of that <S%H1931><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> and the sicknesses <S%H8463><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath laid <S%H2470><s%> upon it;

And that the whole <S%H3605><s%> land <S%H776><s%> thereof is brimstone, <S%H1614><s%> and salt, <S%H4417><s%> and burning, <S%H8316><s%> that it is not <S%H3808><s%> sown, <S%H2232><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> beareth, <S%H6779><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> grass <S%H6212><s%> groweth <S%H5927><s%> therein, like the overthrow <S%H4114><s%> of Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah, <S%H6017><s%> Admah, <S%H126><s%> and Zeboim, <S%H6636><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> overthrew <S%H2015><s%> in his anger, <S%H639><s%> and in his wrath: <S%H2534><s%>

Even all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall say, <S%H559><s%> Wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H4100><s%> hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> done <S%H6213><s%> thus <S%H3602><s%> unto this <S%H2063><s%> land? <S%H776><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> meaneth the heat <S%H2750><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> anger? <S%H639><s%>

Then men shall say, <S%H559><s%> Because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> they have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he made <S%H3772><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> them when he brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

For they went <S%H1980><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> them, gods <S%H430><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> they knew <S%H3045><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> and whom he had not <S%H3808><s%> given <S%H2505><s%> unto them:

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against this <S%H1931><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the curses <S%H7045><s%> that are written <S%H3789><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> book: <S%H5612><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> rooted them out <S%H5428><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> their land <S%H127><s%> in anger, <S%H639><s%> and in wrath, <S%H2534><s%> and in great <S%H1419><s%> indignation, <S%H7110><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> another <S%H312><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> as it is this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

The secret <S%H5641><s%> things belong unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God: <S%H430><s%> but those things which are revealed <S%H1540><s%> belong unto us and to our children <S%H1121><s%> forever, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> that we may do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> law. <S%H8451><s%>
